Event.title: Winter Wonderland Included
Event.text: Modern ski resorts, thrilling snowboard parks, and perfectly groomed cross-country ski trails. Ideal conditions for snow fans of all ages! A unique experience is also deer feeding, which can be enjoyed during a carriage ride or a peaceful walk. Or just stay with us at the farm – snowball fights and snowshoe hiking will complete your winter holiday.

event3.title: Market in Immenstadt 2025
event3.text: At the market you will find, among others, ceramic artists, various jewelry makers, soap boilers, art made of metal and stone, wood and turning work, felt and knit crafts, glassblowers and designers, as well as a painter. The market takes place outdoors in all weather conditions and admission is free!

event2.title: 1525 Peasants' War: We are free and want to remain free! Get your tickets now!
event2.text: The Peasants' War of 1525 as a major theatrical event: This summer, visitors to the Allgäu Open-Air Stage in Altusried can expect a spectacular production with around 500 participants, including nearly 40 speaking roles, featuring grand visuals, horses, carts, and pyrotechnics. But you'll also experience a deeply emotional story, as the people of Altusried bring to life the fate of their own ancestors and their fight for freedom and a better future.

event1.title: Burgfest in Immenstadt 2025 mit Mittelaltermarkt
event1.text: Nach 13 Jahren ist es endlich wieder soweit! Das legendäre Burgfest Immenstadt auf der Burgruine Laubenbergerstein kehrt zurück und lädt vom 19. bis 22. Juni 2025 auf eine unvergessliche Reise ins Mittelalter ein!

Footer.slogan: Farm holidays in the Allgäu – experience nature, pet animals, enjoy family time.

slide1.title: Your vacation at Hengeler's Hof – Relaxation with mountain panorama, sun, nature and mountain view.

slide3.title: Arrive, unpack, feel good – and simply enjoy
slide3.text: Our cozy farmhouse (guest rooms or complete house) welcomes you with loving furnishings and lots of heart. Whether as a couple, with family, group or good friends. Up to 6 guests + baby/child up to 7 years. One dog is welcome, two on request – everyone finds their favorite place here. The mountain view of the Allgäu Alps? Like from a picture book. And the sun? Our wonderful secluded location gives you that as a bonus – for that extra bit of holiday happiness!

slide4.title: Summer time is explorer time!
slide4.text: Whether hiking over blooming alpine meadows, cycling through picturesque valleys, or taking exciting excursions – here the adventure begins right at your doorstep. The Alpsee, the royal castles, Austria or even Switzerland are all close by. Variety? Guaranteed.

slide6.title: Winter wonderland included
slide6.text: Modern ski resorts, thrilling snowboard parks and perfectly groomed ski trails. Ideal conditions for snow lovers of all ages! A special highlight is feeding the deer – you can do this during a carriage ride or a leisurely walk. Or stay right here on the farm – snowball fights and snowshoe walks will make your winter unforgettable.

Rooms.title: Our Rooms
Rooms.description: Comfort and coziness in every room! Our rooms are designed for your relaxation and unwinding in the midst of nature. A cozy atmosphere, modern design, and all amenities for a perfect stay await you.

smallRoom1.title: Small Room: Beds and Wardrobe
smallRoom1.text: A cozy small room with two single beds and a spacious wooden wardrobe. The warm orange decor creates a sunny mood. Perfect for friends or children traveling together. The wooden ceiling adds rustic charm.

smallRoom2.title: Small Room: Bedside Table Decor
smallRoom2.text: Detailed view of the bedside table in the small room. It features a bright yellow lamp, an elegant vase with decorative flowers, and a round woven mat. These elements add personality and coziness to the room, creating a pleasant atmosphere for relaxation.

smallRoom3.title: Small Room: Bed, Wardrobe, and Door
smallRoom3.text: View of a portion of the small room showing one of the beds with orange bedding, a corner wooden wardrobe, and wooden door. This room offers a compact but comfortable space for individual rest, providing all necessary amenities.

bigRoom1.title: Large Room: Bed, Painting, and Window
bigRoom1.text: A spacious large room with a double bed decorated in green tones. On the wall hangs an impressive painting of a forest deer, creating an atmosphere of tranquility and connection with nature. A large window provides plenty of natural light and views of the surroundings.

bigRoom2.title: Large Room: Bedside Tables
bigRoom2.text: Detailed shot of two wooden bedside tables in the large room. They feature an elegant vintage lamp and two vases with decorative lily of the valley, adding elegance and comfort. Each bedside table has two drawers for convenient storage of personal items.

bigRoom3.title: Large Room: Desk and Interior
bigRoom3.text: A cozy large room where, in addition to the bed, there is a functional wooden desk with a chair. This is the perfect spot if you need to work or read. The interior is complemented by a deer painting, table lamp, and decorative shelves, creating a harmonious atmosphere.

bigRoom4.title: Large Room: Tree-Shaped Mirror and Window
bigRoom4.text: Part of the large room featuring a unique wooden tree-shaped mirror that adds special charm to the room. Next to it is a small wooden bedside table with vases, and a large window provides bright natural lighting. There is also a clothes rack present.

neuschwanstein.title: Neuschwanstein Castle
neuschwanstein.description: A real fairy tale castle! Just a short drive away, the world-famous Neuschwanstein Castle awaits you – an unforgettable experience for visitors of all ages.

hohenschwangau.title: Hohenschwangau Castle
hohenschwangau.description: Immerse yourself in the history of Bavarian kings – the charming Hohenschwangau Castle is located directly opposite Neuschwanstein and impresses with historical insights.

gorge.title: Gorge
gorge.description: A special kind of natural wonder: the Breitachklamm is one of the deepest gorges in Europe – impressive, wild, and absolutely worth seeing.

forests.title: Forests
forests.description: Discover the idyllic Allgäu forests right on your doorstep – perfect for walks, short hikes, and exciting adventures with the whole family.

hopfenSee.title: Hopfen am See Promenade
hopfenSee.description: Enjoy a leisurely walk along the shore of Lake Hopfen with mountain views – ideal for relaxing, strolling, and lingering.

mountains.title: Mountains
mountains.description: Whether hiking, cycling, or just enjoying the view – the Allgäu Alps offer stunning vistas and numerous activities for nature lovers.

MainMap.title: How to find us?
MainMap.whereWeAreDescription: Our farm is idyllically located on the edge of the Allgäu Alps, surrounded by lush meadows and fragrant forests – the perfect retreat for nature lovers.

Booking.room1_description: Bright and warmly furnished double room with a large bed, desk, and storage space. Ideal for two adults and one small child (baby cot available on request). Guests have access to a fully equipped shared kitchen and two shared bathrooms (shower and bathtub).
Booking.room2_description: Small room with two separate beds, a small cabinet, and a small chest of drawers for storage. Ideal for active travelers who appreciate simplicity and comfort. Guests have access to a fully equipped shared kitchen and two shared bathrooms with a shower and bathtub.
Booking.room3_description: Large, spacious room with a comfortable double bed, bedside tables, a large wardrobe, a couch with a coffee table, and a separate sofa. It can accommodate two people and can host an additional guest. It also offers a beautiful view of the mountains.
Booking.house_description: Our lovingly furnished farmhouse offers approximately 200 sqm on two levels with complete amenities: a fully equipped kitchen, a cozy living room in country house style, two bathrooms, and three comfortable rooms. Ideal for families or groups of up to 7 people. In the garden, you will find a barbecue area, garden furniture, a sandbox, and a natural view with deer and rabbits.
Booking.room3_max_guests: 2+1 (the sofa can be used as a second bed)

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.responsibleText: The controller for data processing is:
PrivacyPolicy.responsibleLaw: The processing of your personal data is based on the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG), and the Telecommunications-Telemedia Data Protection Act (TTDSG). The legal bases are in particular Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (contract performance), Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interest, e.g. IT security), and, if applicable, Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR (consent). If data is transferred to recipients in third countries, we use EU standard contractual clauses or other appropriate safeguards.
PrivacyPolicy.dataText: We collect personal data to provide our contractual services (e.g. booking and accommodation), to ensure the security of our IT systems, and to technically provide our website. To secure your data, we use SSL/TLS encryption when you access our website.
stripeList: site-auth: Merchant authorization in the Stripe dashboard.
private_machine_identifier, machine_identifier: Fraud prevention and device recognition.
merchant, cid: Stripe account ID and client ID for merchant identification.
_ga: Stripe-internal Google Analytics (not for our website).
stripe_sid, stripe_mid: Session IDs for secure assignment of payment sessions.
stripe_orig_props: Referrer and landing page information for fraud prevention.
secure-has_logged_in: Display of login status in the Stripe dashboard.
PrivacyPolicy.stripeText: Stripe processes your payment data (e.g. credit card information) as an independent controller for the purpose of fraud prevention and payment processing. Our legal basis for transmitting payment data is Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (contract performance). International data transfers are based on EU standard contractual clauses.
ownCookiesList: cookies-accepted: Stores your consent to set non-essential cookies.
NEXT_LOCALE: Stores the language you have selected (Next.js i18n).
Secure-authjs.session-token: Access token for your session via NextAuth.js.
Secure-authjs.callback-url: Stores the URL for redirection after OAuth login.
__Host-authjs.csrf-token: CSRF token to secure your login via Auth.js.
PrivacyPolicy.ownCookiesText: Technically necessary cookies are essential for the operation of the site and are set even without consent. We only set non-essential cookies after your active consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR) via our cookie banner.
PrivacyPolicy.paymentText1: To process your online payment, we use Stripe (Stripe Payments), a payment service from Stripe.com. Your payment data is transmitted directly to Stripe; we only receive confirmation of payment success. Without this transmission, we cannot complete your booking.
PrivacyPolicy.paymentText2: Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (contract performance). Stripe processes payment data as an independent provider for fraud prevention and payment processing. International data transfers are secured by EU standard contractual clauses.
PrivacyPolicy.oauthText1: You can log in to our website using your Google account. We only receive the information (e.g. name, email address) that you explicitly release to us in the Google OAuth consent screen.
PrivacyPolicy.oauthText2: We use this data exclusively for authentication and management of your user account. Our privacy policy is hosted on the same domain and is linked in the OAuth consent screen as required by Google. We comply with Google's Limited Use Policy.
rightsList: Right to information about your stored personal data
Right to rectification of incorrect or incomplete data
Right to erasure (‘right to be forgotten’)
Right to object to processing based on legitimate interests
Right to withdraw consent already given
Right to lodge a complaint with a data protection supervisory authority
PrivacyPolicy.rightsText: To exercise these rights, you can contact us at any time using the contact details provided above.
PrivacyPolicy.retentionText: Your personal data will be deleted or blocked as soon as the purpose of processing no longer applies. Storage beyond this period only takes place if required by law (e.g. tax retention periods).
PrivacyPolicy.updateText: This privacy policy is always available at https://www.hengelershof.com/en/privacypolicy and is updated immediately if our data processing procedures change. Last updated: July 3, 2025.
